item.title: 服务器配置CPU版ToD-BERT环境
item.description: Anaconda新建环境 检查python版本 (base) dialogue@amax-13:~$ python --version Python 3.9.5 Anaconda 创建新环境 (base) dialogue@amax-13:~$ conda create -n tod_bert_cpu python=3.9.5 Collecting package metadata (current_repodata.json): done Solving environment: failed with repodata from current_repodata.json, will retry with next repodata source. Collecting package metadata (repodata.json): done Solving environment: done ## Package Plan ## environment location: /media/HD1/dche/miniconda3/envs/tod_bert_cpu added / updated specs: - python=3.9.5 The following packages will be downloaded: | package | build | | ----------------- | ----------------------------- | | certifi-2021.
